description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: 81st German Catholic Congress at Hamburg; President Charles de Gaulle visits Bonn for a meeting with Chancellor Erhard; scenes in Helmstadt a lignite mining centre with Renaissance period relics; scenery in West Berlin; German Light Athletics Championships at Hannover.
